name: Bootie and Bossy
description:
Bootie and Bossy: Eat, Knit, Play! is a co-op endless arcade game - based on a podcast - where you and a partner control two knitting needles connected by a strand of yarn. You must coordinate to get your yarn to catch things that Bootie and Bossy like while avoiding things that cut the yarn. As you collect good things, your yarn grows. How long can your strand get?

Instructions:

Use WASD to move Bootie. W and S push her forward and backward while A and D rotate her counterclockwise and clockwise.

Use the arrow keys to move Bossy. Up and down push her forward and backward while right and left rotate her counterclockwise and clockwise. 

Collect good things with your strand of yarn like drinks, eats, and yarn balls. As you collect good things, your yarn strand grows longer.

Avoid bad things like scissors and moths that cut your yarn.
